[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@firebase/storage](./storage.md) &gt; [uploadString](./storage.uploadstring.md)

## uploadString() function

Uploads a string to this object's location. The upload is not resumable.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function uploadString(ref: types.StorageReference, value: string, format?: string, metadata?: types.Metadata): Promise<types.UploadResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | types.StorageReference | StorageReference where string should be uploaded. |
|  value | string | The string to upload. |
|  format | string | The format of the string to upload. |
|  metadata | types.Metadata | Metadata for the newly uploaded string. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;types.UploadResult&gt;

A Promise containing an UploadResult
